repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.7.7-slim-buster

COPY .streamlit ~/

COPY ./requirements.txt /app/requirements.txt

WORKDIR /app

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -q -r requirements.txt

COPY . ./

CMD ["streamlit", "run", "app.py"]
